source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
    A.NOME_KEYVAULT_SECRET
FROM ADF.ctr_origem_destino A
WHERE A.NOME_PLATAFORMA = 'SMART'

FROM FAT FAT WITH(NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN v_bi_smm SMM WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAT.FAT_SERIE = SMM.SMM_FAT_SERIE AND FAT.FAT_NUM = SMM.SMM_FAT
WHERE CAST(FAT.FAT_DEMI AS DATE) >= DATEADD(DAY,-90,CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
